title: Episode 90: Greenpoint Reformed Church Hunger Program
description:
Nobody should be hungry. Pastor Ann Kansfield joins Cathy Erway on this week’s episode of Let’s Eat In to talk about her work with the Greenpoint Reformed Church Hunger Program. Tune in and learn about the ins and outs of soup kitchens and why people have come to trust churches in times of need. Learn how you can help by clicking here. This episode was sponsored by Whole Foods Market

“If people have to choose between rent, medications and food, most people will cut back on food and as a result go hungry.”

–Pastor Ann Kansfield on Let’s Eat In
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
